text: (Fushin-sha ni) itte yaru ga i. `Arra no takaramono ga watashi no te ni aru to wa, anata gata ni iwanai. Mata watashi wa, yugen-kai ni tsuite mo shiranai. Mata watashi wa tenshidearu to mo iwanai. Watashi wa, tada watashi ni keiji sa reta koto ni shitagau dakedearu.' Itte yaru ga i. `Mojin to seijo no me no hito to wa onajidearou ka. Soredemo anata gata wa hansei shinai no ka
